//Splash Dev Notes This application is part of a project for the final year dissertation of Matthew J Ashworth for the BSc in Computer Science. \n \nDue to the nature of the project Open Days run on specific days. The first Open Day scheduled is on the 22nd May 2018. \n \nFeel free to use the app with the provided demo open day template or view the code. Details about the neccessary dependancies and build tools are located in "README". \n\nThanks Matt.

13:00 - Staff House
13:10 - Fenner
13:20 - RBB
13:30 - Library
14:45 - Larkin
14:50 - Venn
14:55 - Middleton Hall
15:00 - Business School

15:30 - Ferens
15:35 - Wilberforce
15:40 - University Union
15:50 - The Courtyard
16:00 - Sports and Fitness Centre
Your tour group will now start at 13:10
There will be 12 people in your tour group
Contact me using the send message button
Your tour should last 1 hour
You will be expected to answer any questions visitors may have
You can use the app to give you any pointers if you get stuck
Please stick to the schedule seen in the app
If you get lost look in the map section for a new route
The map section shows all the university buildings
The icon in the bottom right logs you out
The Timeline View was created by Matt J Ashworth in May 2017
The Canvas API was made from reverse engineering the private API endpoint
We hope you like the fancy background animations
Using a Parse server meant that I didn't have to manually store the session in order to keep the user logged in
More about this app in the README
Good luck
open close
